about_the_game:
Cadets, “Operation Prelude“ has begun! In this demo you can explore a unique test mission, specifically tailored to let you experience the real-time tactics gameplay of the upcoming Commandos: Origins before its launch.

Guide the Green Beret and the Marine on a mission to the Channel Islands and make use of some of their unique skills to sabotage a cutting-edge German radar system, responsible for a shocking surge in RAF casualties.

Coming Over: The Green Beret is skilled with both his Combat Knife and Colt M1911 – but sometimes it’s just more effective to use a Sound Decoy to distract the soldiers and sneak past unnoticed.

Calm like the Sea: The Marine uses his Throwing Knives with deadly precision and is an expert at throwing a simple stone to divert the attention of guards.

Demo Features

  • This demo includes a specifically tailored map and test mission: “Operation: Prelude” to introduce you into the core gameplay of Commandos: Origins in singleplayer mode. The full game will include 14 missions and will also feature a multiplayer mode.

  • The demo mission will have you control two out of the six members from the legendary Commandos squad. These are the Green Beret and the Marine.

  • Seize Control: The PC demo supports keyboard and mouse as well as Xbox gamepad.

Upon launch, Commandos: Origins will include the following features:

  • Challenging Real Time Tactical Stealth Gameplay: Make the best use of your Commandos’ unique abilities, infiltrate enemy facilities and hit them where it hurts most before disappearing into the shadows.

  • An extraordinary team: Featuring 6 infamous characters, each with their own storied history, banding together to form an extraordinary fighting force – the Commandos: Take control over Jack O’Hara “the Green Beret”, Thomas “the Sapper” Hancock, Francis T. “the Sniper” Woolridge, Samuel “the Driver” Brooklyn, James “the Marine” Blackwood, and Rene “the Spy” Duchamp and lead them to success.

  • Many paths to victory: The detailed, varied and interactive environments offer multiple approaches to reach your goal. Sneak, climb, drive in various vehicles, or hide and creep your way to mission success!

  • On your mark: A modern user experience with precise and intuitive controls enables you to control the commandos with expert precision. Coordinate complex actions simultaneously to overcome heavily fortified targets.

  • Fight on all fronts: Play through more than 10 missions in historically authentic WWII environments, spanning from the barren Arctic to the African desert, with a range of core and voluntary objectives that will require your full tactical expertise.

  • There is no I in team: Take on missions with a friend in the 2-player cooperative multiplayer mode, either online or via local split-screen.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages: Violence, Alcohol and Tobacco references
